renderer::TextureFormat

renderer::TextureFormat Namespace Reference

External texture representation format.


Enumerations

enum  {
  COLOR_INDEX, RED, GREEN, BLUE,
  ALPHA, RGB, RGBA, LUMINANCE,
  LUMINANCE_ALPHA, DEPTH, DEPTH_STENCIL
}

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
COLOR_INDEX  Stored value is an index to palet (left for compatibility only).
RED  Stored value is a single R component.
GREEN  Stored value is a single G component.
BLUE  Stored value is a single B component.
ALPHA  Stored value is a single A component.
RGB  Stored value is a RGB triplet.
RGBA  Stored value is a RGBA quadlet.
LUMINANCE  Stored value is a single luminance value.
LUMINANCE_ALPHA  Stored value is a luminance alpha pair.
DEPTH  Stored value is a single depth component.
DEPTH_STENCIL  Stored value is a depth stencil pair (if supported, otherwise is treated as DEPTH).
